newsitem.title: UK: UK shares hit new intraday peak after Dow advance.
newsitem.headline: UK shares hit new intraday peak after Dow advance.

text.p: British stocks opened at an intraday record on Tuesday, buoyed by an upbeat Wall Street session in which the Dow posted its biggest one-day gain in over a month and T-bonds also improved.

Leading shares were marked higher across the board and the FTSE 100 index was up 19.9 points at 3,930.7 by 0743 GMT -- surpassing its record 3,922.1 set August 28. Gainers outweighed losers 15-to-one in modest volume of 23.3 million shares.
Traders said the market could hold on to its early gains through the rest of the session, as fears over U.S. interest prospects abate boosting U.S. markets.
